INSERT INTO stock_data (id, symbol, trade, price_change, change_percent, open, high, low, volume, amount, inside_dish, outer_disc, turnover_ratio, tick_time, update_time) VALUES
(#{stock.id}, #{stock.symbol}, #{stock.trade}, #{stock.priceChange}, #{stock.changePercent}, #{stock.open}, #{stock.high}, #{stock.low}, #{stock.volume}, #{stock.amount}, #{stock.insideDish}, #{stock.outerDisc}, #{stock.turnoverRatio}, #{stock.tickTime}, #{stock.updateTime})

CREATE TABLE if not exists `stock_data_${todayTable}` ( `id` bigint NOT NULL COMMENT '主键ID', `symbol` varchar(20) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '股票代码', `trade` decimal(10,3) NOT NULL COMMENT '当前交易价格', `price_change` decimal(10,3) NOT NULL COMMENT '涨跌', `change_percent` decimal(10,3) NOT NULL COMMENT '涨跌幅', `open` decimal(10,3) NOT NULL COMMENT '当日开盘价', `high` decimal(10,3) NOT NULL COMMENT '当日最高价', `low` decimal(10,3) NOT NULL COMMENT '当日最低价', `volume` bigint NOT NULL COMMENT '当日成交量', `amount` decimal(65,3) NOT NULL COMMENT '当日成交金额', `inside_dish` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '内盘（主动卖出的成交量）', `outer_disc` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '外盘（主动买入的成交量）', `turnover_ratio` decimal(10,5) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '换手率', `tick_time` datetime NOT NULL COMMENT '数据更新时间', `update_time` datetime DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE, KEY `index_code` (`code`) USING BTREE, KEY `index_tick_time` (`tick_time`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC COMMENT='股票日数据表';
insert into `stock_data_${todayTable}` select * from stock_data where date (tick_time) =#{date}
